column2: Wal-Mart sued over sale of fake 'Egyptian cotton' linen Wal-Mart Stores Inc  was sued on Tuesday on behalf of consumers who said the world's largest retailer sold products falsely labeled "100 % Egyptian Cotton" from an Indian textile company for many years after it first became suspicious of their origin. ~UPDATE 1-Wal-Mart sued over sale of fake 'Egyptian cotton' linen Nov 8 Wal-Mart Stores Inc was sued on Tuesday on behalf of consumers who said the world's largest retailer sold products falsely labeled "100 % Egyptian Cotton" from an Indian textile company for many years after it first became suspicious of their origin. ~Wal-Mart sued over sale of fake 'Egyptian cotton' linen Nov 8 Wal-Mart Stores Inc was sued on Tuesday on behalf of consumers who said the world's largest retailer sold products falsely labeled "100 % Egyptian Cotton" from an Indian textile company for many years after it first became suspicious of their origin. ~
